subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-b-(r/j)aŋ||fly, bee}}. Compare {{cog|bo|སྦྲང་བུ||bee}} and {{cog|my|ယင်ကောင်||fly}}.
